events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department based on your experience and skills.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case to guide you through the hiring process.
We have completed the initial screening of your application and found your background promising for the software engineer role.
Thank you for promptly responding to our screening questions. Your answers have helped us understand your fit better.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 20th at 10 AM UTC with our senior developers.
